name: Booblz
description:
Press W to move forward, A to turn the camera left, D to turn the camera right, S to move backwards, O to move down, and P to move up. You must find the soap box that actually looks just like a box with a picture of a house. Be careful to not hit any other surfaces or you will have to restart from the beginning.

Music by Triforce Films (look it up on youtube)
